meanings.definition: The act of changing the zoning classification of a piece of land.
meanings.sent1: The rezoning of the area allowed for new businesses to open.
meanings.sent2: The city council approved the rezoning of the neighborhood for residential development.
meanings.sent3: After the rezoning, the land felt like it got a new outfit.
meanings.sent4: The rezoning was a fresh coat of paint on the community's future.
meanings.sent5: The rezoning decision reshaped the landscape of the town.

meanings.definition: The process of altering the designated use of a specific area.
meanings.sent1: The rezoning of the park turned it into a playground for children.
meanings.sent2: Residents were concerned about the rezoning of the industrial zone into a residential one.
meanings.sent3: The rezoning news made the town hall meeting more interesting.
meanings.sent4: The rezoning process was like rearranging furniture in a room.
meanings.sent5: The rezoning brought a new purpose to the old building.
